content: TE 30 Rotary hammer Powerful SDS Plus (TE-C) rotary hammer for heavy-duty concrete drilling ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Rotary hammers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick-change chucks – changing bits is fast and tool-free Extra-long lifetime thanks to a highly robust chuck, motor components and casing OSHA 1926.1153 Table 1 compliant when used with the TE DRS-D dust removal system and a Hilti vacuum cleaner Applications Drilling holes for anchors and rebar connections as well as through-holes in concrete and masonry: possible diameter range 4-28 mm, recommended diameter range 10-20 mm Drilling in wood and metal using the optional quick-release chuck and drill bits with smooth shank up to 13 mm diameter Driving anchor screws and concrete screw anchors ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 9 lb. Optimum Hammer drilling range: 13/32 - 25/32 in Single impact energy: 2.7 ft-lbs Technical Data | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 9 lb | Optimum Hammer drilling range | 13/32 - 25/32 in | Single impact energy | 2.7 ft-lbs | Working mode | Hammer drilling, Drilling | Hammer drilling diameter range | 5/32 - 1-3/32 in | Hammer drilling RPM | 1100 rpm | Full hammering frequency | 4500 impacts/minute | Functionality | Removable chuck, Reverse mode, Depth gauge | Triaxial vibration value for hammer drilling into concrete (ah,HD) | 14.4 m/s² | 1 | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 95 dB (A) | 2 | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 14.2 x 4.4 x 8.9 mm | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3951471 - TE 30 Performance Package - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 30 120V Combihammer - 1x Depth gauge - 1x TE 30 Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x TE-CX 3/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 1/4-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 5/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 3/8-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX(5) 1/2-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX(5) 5/8-8 Hammer drill bit - 3578571 - TE 30 performance package - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 30 120V Combihammer - 1x Depth gauge - 1x TE 30 Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x Hammer drill bit TE-CX 1/2-12 - 1x Hammer drill bit TE-CX 5/8-6 - 2160200 - Rotary Hammer TE 30-120V Case - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 30 120V Combihammer - 1x Depth gauge - 1x TE 30 Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml
